title: Analysis | Video: Two wrongs don’t make a right. The Republican spin on Obamacare premiums
subtitle: For years, Republicans have run inaccurate attack ads based on President Obama's misleading claim that health-insurance premiums would decline by $2,500.
author: www.washingtonpost.com
